text: Lionel Price (6 February 1927 - 10 January 2019) was a British basketball player. He competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was part of the British basketball team, which finished twentieth in the Olympic tournament. Price died on 10 January 2019 at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British basketball players Category:Olympians for Great Britain
title: Lionel Price
